LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargePistol.label: charge pistol shot
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargePistol.label: charge pistol
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargePistol.description: This high-tech, self-loading pistol uses pulse-charge technology to channel unstable energy into each shot. The charged energy is released on impact, delivering superior damage and armor penetration. Its compact size and reliability make it an ideal backup weapon in high-tech combat.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargePistol.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargePistol.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargeShotgun.label: charge shotgun blast
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeShotgun.label: charge shotgun
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeShotgun.description: A sophisticated, high-tech scattergun utilizing pulse-charge technology. The energy is channeled into a single, high-impact slug, delivering devastating damage and superior armor penetration at close range. Its integrated pump-action mechanism cycles rounds rapidly, making it the ultimate tool for close-quarters breach and clear operations.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeShotgun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeShotgun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargeSMG.label: charge SMG shot
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSMG.label: charge SMG
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSMG.description: A compact submachine gun built using advanced pulse-charge technology. It fires a rapid burst of kinetic rounds charged with unstable energy, trading long-range precision for devastating, high-penetration firepower at close quarters. Its speed and size make it an exceptional weapon for clearing enclosed spaces.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSMG.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSMG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargeLMG.label: charge blaster shot
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeLMG.label: charge blaster
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeLMG.description: A massive, portable charge weapon designed for sustained, suppressive fire. It uses advanced pulse-charge technology to channel and release devastating shots charged with unstable energy through its heavy-duty barrel. This design sacrifices spread for sheer focused power, making it capable of tearing apart multiple enemies or structures in a single, prolonged burst.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeLMG.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargeMinigun.label: heavy charge blaster shot
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeMinigun.label: heavy charge blaster
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeMinigun.description: A colossal charge weapon adapted for portable use. It channels immense pulse-charge energy into heavy-caliber slugs, firing them in devastating, sustained bursts. While its mass makes it difficult to handle, it is unrivaled in its capacity to tear through hardened targets and armored columns.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeMinigun.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeRocketLauncher.label: charge missile launcher
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeRocketLauncher.description: A portable, shoulder-fired launcher that uses laser targeting to fire an explosive, charged missile high into the air. The projectile follows a ballistic arc, allowing it to bypass cover and strike targets without needing a direct line of sight. Must be used in an unroofed area.
LanguageData.VWE_Rocket_AntiGrain.label: antigrain rocket
LanguageData.Bullet_ChargeSniperRifle.label: charge sniper slug
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSniperRifle.label: charge sniper rifle
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSniperRifle.description: A specialized, high-velocity charge rifle designed for extreme-range engagement with anti-armor capabilities. It channels immense pulse-charge energy into a single, kinetic slug, delivering extremely high damage and armor penetration with pinpoint accuracy at maximum distance. Its bulk requires a stable firing position.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSniperRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSniperRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
